description: Render text subtitles onto input video using the libass library.
name: subtitles

options.description: Set the filename of the subtitle file to read. It must be specified.
options.name: filename

options.description: Specify the size of the original video, the video for which the ASS file was composed. For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Video size" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual. Due to a misdesign in ASS aspect ratio arithmetic, this is necessary to correctly scale the fonts if the aspect ratio has been changed.
options.name: original_size

options.description: Set a directory path containing fonts that can be used by the filter. These fonts will be used in addition to whatever the font provider uses.
options.name: fontsdir

options.description: Process alpha channel, by default alpha channel is untouched.
options.name: alpha

options.description: Set subtitles input character encoding. subtitles filter only. Only useful if not UTF-8.
options.name: charenc

options.description: Override default style or script info parameters of the subtitles. It accepts a string containing ASS style format KEY=VALUE couples separated by ",".
options.name: force_style
